jPokémon: The Pokémon API

Provides well-documented data structures and utilities for Pokémon games written in Java.

org.jpokemon.pmapi.item
Class ItemStack

java.lang.Object
  org.jpokemon.pmapi.item.ItemStack

public class ItemStack
extends Object

Defines a class to hold both an item and an amount. Used as the contents of a player's bag.
